mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FILE (FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_SIZE, FILE_IS_IMAGE, BOARD_ID) VALUES(SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL,#{fileName},#{fileUploadPath},#{fileUuid},#{fileSize},#{fileIsImage},#{boardId})
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_SIZE, FILE_IS_IMAGE, BOARD_ID FROM TBL_FILE WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
SELECT FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_SIZE, FILE_IS_IMAGE, BOARD_ID FROM TBL_FILE WHERE FILE_UPLOAD_PATH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1 + 'YYYY/MM/DD')
